title: Do you need H.LP ? ğŸ˜‰
friendlyBody:
So, I'm a {{age}} years old mammal from a place called "France".

I'm interested in intellectual games: Chess, League of Legends, coding...

People told me that I'm a good listener: I'll be glad to hear your story and your need! I also love chill electronic music. It makes me travel in the most ecological way possible.

I'm always open to talk philosophy and politics. I personally hope that I will have a positive impact on society, sooner or later.
proBody:
After 2 years of technical training as an employee, I now want to be able to explore several lifestyles and landscapes.

"Digital Nomad" is the state of being able to work remotely and travel at the same time, and it is a growing trend.

I lose the security and the regularity of being employed, but this will allow me to discover a variety of different technical projects, and the freedom to work hard or chill when I want it.
proAlt: A portrait of me being serious
